gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Heat 108, Lakers 107
gameRecap.excerpt: Bam Adebayo recorded 22 points, 20 rebounds, and 10 assists for the Heat as they defeated the Lakers, 108-107. Jimmy Butler added a team-high 28 points for the Heat in the victory, while LeBron James led all scorers with 30 points, four rebounds, and 3 blocks for the Lakers in the losing effort. The Heat improve to 3-4 on the season, while the Lakers fall to 3-4.
